title: Build a Funnel Visualization
description: An analyst needs to create a funnel visualization to see the drop-off rates between key steps on the website (e.g., from homepage to product page to cart to purchase).

tasks.description: Define the stages of the conversion funnel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines the steps of the funnel.

tasks.description: In the analytics tool, create a new funnel report using the defined stages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully configures the funnel report.

tasks.description: Analyze the funnel visualization to identify the biggest drop-off point.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the step in the process where the most users are leaving.
